data.Breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1 medium apple, diced, 1 Tbsp. chia seeds (Mix apple and chia seeds into the oatmeal.)
data.P.M. Snack: 1 medium orange, 1/4 cup unsalted dry-roasted almonds
data.Dinner: 1 serving Bean & Barley Soup, 2 cups mixed greens, 1 serving Garlic-Oregano Vinaigrette
data.Daily Totals: 1,225 calories, 58 g protein, 71 g carbs, 22 g fiber, 84 g fat, 1,313 mg sodium
data.Make it 1,200 Calories Day: Omit the apple at breakfast and the almonds at the P.M. snack.
data.Make it 2,000 Calories Day: Add 3 Tbsp. chopped walnuts to the A.M. snack and add 1 whole avocado to dinner.

data.Breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmea,1 medium apple, diced, 1 Tbsp. chia seeds(Mix apple and chia seeds into the oatmeal.)
data.Dinner: 1 serving Warm Chicken Salad with Peas & Polenta
data.Daily Totals: 1,479 calories, 80 g protein, 156 g carbohydrates, 38 g fiber, 66 g fat, 1,115 mg sodium
data.Make it 1,200 Calories Day: Omit the apple at breakfast and change the A.M. snack to 1/2 cup sliced cucumber.
data.Make it 2,000 Calories Day: Add 1 medium apple to the A.M. snack, add 1/4 cup unsalted dry-roasted almonds to the P.M. snack and add 1 serving Guacamole Chopped Salad to dinner.

data.Breakfast: 1 serving Old-Fashioned Oatmeal, 1 medium apple, diced, 1 Tbsp. chia seeds (Mix apple and chia seeds into the oatmeal.)

data.Make it 2,000 Calories Day: Add 20 unsalted dry-roasted almonds to P.M. snack and add 1 avocado to dinner.
